[[Category:Jewish Roots]]
== Biography ==
Rachel Solomons was born on 25 December 1891 at 2 Booth Street Buildings, Spitalfields, London.  Her father, [[Solomons-288]] was a Tailor Machinist at the time, and the maiden name of her mother [[Levinson-273]] was Levenson.<ref name="BC1">
'''"England and Wales Birth Registration Index, 1837-2008,"''' database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:2FM5-G6B : 1 October 2014),
citing Rachel Solomons, 1892, quarter 1, vol. 1C, p. 312, Whitechapel, London, England, General Register Office, Southport, England.
</ref>

Rachel married Mark Goldstein on 6 October 1918 at the East London Synagogue in Stepney Green, London<ref name="MC1">
'''"FreeBMD GRO Marriage Index,"''' database with images, FreeBMD (https://www.freebmd.org.uk/cgi/information.pl?cite=4F2o8ftVhssbd3U8VzQUQA&scan=1 : 22 November 2021), 
citing Rachel SOLOMONS, 1918, quarter 4, vol. 1C, p. 584, Mile End, London, England, General Register Office, Southport, England.
</ref>.

Rachel died shortly before 2 November 1982 in the Poplar\Bethnal Green area of London.  She was buried on 2 November 1982 at Waltham Abbey jewish cemetery in Section 5, Row T, Plot 962. <ref name="DC1">
'''"FreeBMD GRO Death Index,"''' database with images, FreeBMD (https://www.freebmd.org.uk/cgi/information.pl?cite=UgwRjG3YUIUp%2BmgMynN6Hw&scan=1 : 22 November 2022),
Rachel Goldstein, 1982, quarter. 4, vol. 14, p. 1119, Poplar\B GRN, London, England, General Register Office, Southport, England.
</ref><ref name="BUR1">
'''"United Synagogue find a grave"''' database with images (https://www.theus.org.uk/category/find-grave) (accessed 12 Nov 22)
citing cemetery. Waltham Abbey, first name. Rachel, last name. Goldstein, year of burial. 1982
(burial. 2-Nov-1982, section. 5, row. T, plot. 962)
</ref>.
